summary: Ponzio Doge - For his own amusement, Ponzio the DOG has engineered a financial mechanism that guarantees the meteoric rise of $PONZIE. Here’s the game-changer: every four days, the total supply of $PONZIE is slashed by half—leaving Bitcoin's languid four-year halving cycle in the dust. How it works: every 34 minutes or so, a slight debase dwindles the supply, cunningly driving prices ever upward. With a sharply reducing number of tokens and persistent demand, the value of $PONZIE is poised for stratospheric escalation, showcasing the most ludicrously ingenious ponziest tokenomics ever devised in the crypto realm.
